query: What is the minimum preheat temperature for ASTM A514 steel 1.5 inches thick per AWS D1.1:2025 Table 5.8?
rationale: Table 5.8 in D1.1:2025 consolidates minimum preheat and interpass temperatures for prequalified joints. A514 steel (high-strength quenched and tempered alloy) requires higher preheat than mild steel to prevent hydrogen-induced cracking. For material thickness >1 inch, the specified minimum is 225°F per the revised table.

citations.excerpt: ASTM A514: thickness >1 in. — minimum preheat 225°F
